feels.name: Freedom
feels.quote: She let herself go with a wild, inner exultation, as Uncle Herbert carved the turkey.

feels.name: Amusement
feels.quote: She was gazing around the table, examining relentlessly every one in this depressing assembly of sensible people and watching their little squirms with a detached, amused smile.

feels.name: Rebellion
feels.quote: She was giving herself such freedom of thought as she had never dared to take before. She let herself go with a wild, inner exultation.

Places.name: Uncle_Herbert_s_house
Places.description: A large, pretentious structure peppered with meaningless bay windows and excrescent porches.
